gist.headline: Mindful moments with Tenna
gist.blurb: We've added Tenna AI to our community showcaseâ€”a new companion for mood analysis, guided journaling, and relaxation.
gist.summary: Added Tenna AI, a mental health companion app, to the community applications directory.
gist.impact: Users can now discover Tenna AI in the apps list to help with journaling and mindfulness.
gist.visual_concept: A zen garden scene representing mental wellness. The Pollinations bee is taking a break to journal or meditate, accompanied by a symbol of the new app (a gentle heart or lotus).
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the cute bee mascot sitting cross-legged on a cushion, writing in a tiny journal next to a friendly floating pixel heart. Cozy 8-bit pixel art aesthetic. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and lavender pastel gradient background. The bee wears a tiny headband. Chunky retro sprites. Warm lighting, lo-fi vibes like Stardew Valley or A Short Hike. Text in pixel font: 'TENNA AI'. Nostalgic but beautiful, emotionally warm.
